title: Sign
lyrics:
Galsurok huimihaejyeo
Nal saranghaetdeon ne pyojeong
Gamchwodo seonmyeonghaejyeo
Jogeumssik byeonhaeganeun neo
Neoui jinsimeul deutgil barae now now now
Mwol geureoke jakku mareul dollyeo round round round

Yeah anin cheok barabwado imi imi

Naegeneun da boineun geol



Moraecheoreom neon sege jwilsurok

Naegeseo heuteojyeo



Eotgallin nunbit geotjabeul sudo eopsi beonjin uisim

Bimireul gamchun deuthan neoui sign sign sign

Ije geuman Don't lie lie lie

Da taewobeoril

Bulkkochi pieonalji molla

Nega naege deonjin geu mal I know

Geu modeun geon sign sign sign



Honestly you da true

Honestly you da true

Body talk when you move

Body talk when you move



Jeongmage jamgin gonggi

Eoreum wireul geotdeut buranhae

Kkeuteomneun i angmongeul

Meomchwojwo deo neutgi jeone

Naega gidarineun geu daedabeul

Neoneun imi algo inneunde

Jeokdanghi neomeogal saenggageun ma

Charari nareul mireonae



Sillatgatatdeon gidaemajeodo

Sansani buseojyeo



Eotgallin nunbit geotjabeul sudo eopsi beonjin uisim

Bimireul gamchun deuthan neoui sign sign sign

Ije geuman Donâ€™t lie lie lie

Da taewobeoril

Bulkkochi pieonalji molla

Nega naege deonjin geu mal I know

Geu modeun geon sign sign sign



Gyeolguk neoneun gatige dwae

Nega baeteun suthan byeonmyeongdeurui milsil ane

Nega noeun deoche honja gyesokaeseo bari geollyeo

Ringing a bell meoritsoge like (ting!)

Kkaedatgin neon neomu neujeotji yah



Neoman baratdeon maeum

Jeonbu han jumui jaero byeonhaega

(nal dorikil su eopge hae)

Heunjeok eopsi heunnallin ne gieokdeul

Modu kkeuchiraneun jeunggeo jeomjeom



Eotgallin uri geotjabeul sudo eopsi beonjin bulgil

Hana dul deureonaneun neoui sign sign sign

Kkeunnae deulkin neoui lie lie lie

Ibyeolkkaji modu taewobeorilji molla

Nal saranghandaneun geu mal oh no

Ijjeumeseo bye bye bye



Honestly you da true

Honestly you da true

Body talk when you move

Body talk when you move

Honestly you da true

Honestly you da true

Body talk when you move

Body talk when you move
